description: Jace Tyler plays Steven, the youngest son of the master of the Abbey in the third installment of the Abbey series. Steven is a forward thinker and a man about social change, unheard of in the time. He finds a like-minded individual in his driver Tom, played by Paddy O’Brian. Their shared views on the world turn into their shared love for each other. They confess their feelings for each other, but know in the world they live in they can never be. Before leaving the Abbey, Steven and Tom are able to spend one night together, the only they will always cherish.
title: The Abbey Part 3
